description: While Pierre Fitch is having the memory of his ex-boyfriend erased, Dr. Jessy Ares, and Flex, decide to unwind with a sensual fuck session. They place Pierre in the capable hands of the auto-pilot, and then Flex operates his tongue around Jessy’s throbbing dick. Dr. Ares fucks Flex’s muscle-ass in countless different positions. Hopefully, for Pierre’s sake, the sexy doctor knows as much about the mind as he does about pounding hot ass.
title: Erase And Rewind Part 3
